de.affect.compute

Class ExponentialDecayFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.affect.compute.ExponentialDecayFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DecayFunction

    public class ExponentialDecayFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements DecayFunction
    This class uses an exponential function for the emotion decay.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(int decaySteps)
        Description copied from interface: DecayFunction
        Initializes the decay function. The decay function computes for each emotion in the emotion vector a decay factor based on the number of steps required to decay to the emotion baseline.
        Specified by:
        init in interface DecayFunction
        Parameters:
        decaySteps - the number of steps to decay

      • decay

        public Emotion decay(Emotion emotion)
        Description copied from interface: DecayFunction
        Decays an emotion and returns the result. The intensity of an emotion is always greater or equal to the emotion baseline.
        Specified by:
        decay in interface DecayFunction
        Parameters:
        emotion - the emotion to decay
        Returns:
        the decayed emotion

      • decaySteps

        public int decaySteps()
        Description copied from interface: DecayFunction
        Access the amount of decay steps.
        Specified by:
        decaySteps in interface DecayFunction
        Returns:
        the number of steps to decay.
